text: term and reimbursement alimony amend rsa iii to read as follows the maximum duration of term alimony shall be percent of the length of the marriage unless the parties agree otherwise or the court finds that justice requires an adjustment under paragraph if justice requires the court may use a different beginning or ending date in measuring the length of the marriage term alimony shall end on the remarriage of the payee unless the order is based on an agreement of the parties that provides otherwise
